title: Refex on ESG
content:
At Refex Industries Limited, we believe in creating a better world through sustainable business practices. We prioritize People, Planet, and Profit equally and are committed to becoming an ESG champion and carbon-neutral company.

By aligning with the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals, we are taking action towards a brighter future. We invite you to join hands with Refex Group in our efforts towards sustainability and make a positive impact on the world!
